subject: Invitation to Contribute in IJRITCC
body:
International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC)ISSN: 2321-8169 http://www.ijritcc.org Dear Authors, We are feeling proud by announcing that the International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC) is now ScholarOne (Clarivate Analysis) Journal. Call for Papers - September - 2018 (Paper Submission Deadline 30 - September - 2018) Volume 6 Issue 9 (Total Issue Published: 79) Manuscript Requirments: Title page Brief abstract Content with appropriate headings and subheadings Consecutively numbered pages Titled and numbered figures and tables Complete references Paper Submission Last Date of Submission : September 30, 2018 Paper Submission Link: http://www.ijritcc.com/sendy/l/7763wC9IuFJ3763uqOqnowUIIA/p4pyjpOGw892ae5G1qEr5yhA/XPibI7IJD2iOxxN6XbEnDQsubmit-your-paper IJRITCC Manuscript Template: http://www.ijritcc.com/sendy/l/7763wC9IuFJ3763uqOqnowUIIA/p4pyjpOGw892ae5G1qEr5yhA/XPibI7IJD2iOxxN6XbEnDQdownload/1477466677.docx Publication Fee (Maximum 6 Authors)  Indian Authors: INR 2000 Overseas: USD 125 Note:  We have also the collaboration with UGC Journals. You can also email us separately for publication in UGC Journals. IJRITCC is the one of the renowned, fully OPEN ACCESS, International Engineering Journal with more than 250000 monthly content viewers according to worlds biggest research articles database. IJRITCC is trusted by more than 37000 satisfied authors worldwide & growing rapidly. Call for Reviewers: You can email your C.V. to editor@ijritcc.org. Kindly mention your research area in the resume.  Reviewing requires the investment of time and a certain skill set. Before you decide if you want to become a reviewer, we recommend that you read more about the peer review process and conducting a review. Kindly forward this e-mail to your group of Friends / Students/ Colleagues / Associates / Fellow Researchers, who may be benefited out of this. Thanking You, Editor IJRITCC www.ijritcc.org --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Unsubscribe using below link Unsubscribe here If Unsubscribe link is not working kindly reply us unsubscribe. We will never send you email again.

International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC) ISSN: 2321-8169

http://www.ijritcc.org

Dear Authors,

We are feeling proud by announcing that the International Journal on Recent and Innovation Trends in Computing and Communication (IJRITCC) is Indexed in Microsoft Academic.

Microsoft Academic: https://academic.microsoft.com/journal/2764488870

Call for Papers - August - 2019 (Paper Submission Deadline 31 - August - 2019)

Volume 6 Issue 9 (Total Issue Published: 97)

Manuscript Requirments:

  • Title page
  • Brief abstract
  • Content with appropriate headings and subheadings
  • Consecutively numbered pages
  • Titled and numbered figures and tables
  • Complete references

Paper Submission

  • Last Date of Submission : August 31, 2019
  • Paper Submission Link: http://www.ijritcc.org/submit-your-paper
  • IJRITCC Manuscript Template: http://www.ijritcc.org/download/1477466677.docx

Publication Fee (Maximum 6 Authors) 

  • Indian Authors: INR 2000
  • Overseas: USD 125

Note:  We have also the collaboration with CARE / SCOPUS Journals. You can also email us separately for publication in UGC CARE  or SCOPUS Journals.

IJRITCC is the one of the renowned, fully OPEN ACCESS, International Engineering Journal with more than 250000 monthly content viewers according to worlds biggest research articles database. IJRITCC is trusted by more than 37000 satisfied authors worldwide & growing rapidly.

Call for Reviewers:

You can email your C.V. to editor@ijritcc.org. Kindly mention your research area in the resume.  Reviewing requires the investment of time and a certain skill set. Before you decide if you want to become a reviewer, we recommend that you read more about the peer review process and conducting a review.

Kindly forward this e-mail to your group of Friends / Students/ Colleagues / Associates / Fellow Researchers, who may be benefited out of this.

Thanking You,

Editor IJRITCC

www.ijritcc.org
